contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Television | show_name = Yearbook | image = | caption = | show_name_2 = | genre = [[Reality Television]] | format = | creator = | developer = | writer = | director = [[Hank O'Karma]] | creative_director = | presenter = | starring = | judges = | voices = | narrated = [[Ken Dashow]] | theme_music_composer = | opentheme = | endtheme = | composer = | country = [[United States|USA]] | language = [[English language|English]] | num_seasons = 1 | num_episodes = 9 | list_episodes = | executive_producer = | producer = | editor = | location = [[Glen Ellyn]], [[Illinois]], [[United States|USA]] | cinematography = | camera = | runtime = 30 minutes | company = | distributor = | channel = [[Fox Broadcasting Company|Fox]] | picture_format = | audio_format = | first_run = | first_aired = 7 March 1991 | last_aired = 4 May 1991 | status = Ended | preceded_by = | followed_by = | related = | website = | production_website = }} '''Yearbook''' was a [[Television documentary|documentary]] [[television series]] that aired on the [[Fox Network]] in 1991. It is one of the earliest examples of a [[reality series]] as it chronicled the school and home lives of various students of [[Glenbard West High School]] in [[Glen Ellyn, Illinois]] — a [[suburb]] of [[Chicago, Illinois|Chicago]]. The critically acclaimed series was filmed over a six-month period, five days a week by Chicago Videographer Ned Miller in the betacam video format.<ref>{{cite book|title=The Complete Directory to Prime Time Network and Cable TV Shows, 1946-Present|year=2003|publisher=Ballantine Books|isbn=0-345-45542-8|pages=1334}}</ref> Among the subjects covered were Homecoming, sports competition, dating, the war in [[Iraq]] and personal tragedy. The premise of the show was repeated in another Fox reality series ''[[American High (TV series)|American High]]'', which was filmed in 2000 at another suburban Chicago school — [[Highland Park High School, Illinois|Highland Park High School]] in [[Highland Park, Illinois]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb title|0101239|Yearbook}} * {{tv.com show|yearbook|Yearbook}} [[Category:American reality television series]] [[Category:1991 American television series debuts]] [[Category:1991 American television series endings]] [[Category:Fox network shows]] [[Category:Teen dramas]] [[Category:High school television series]] {{US-reality-tv-stub}}
